message: I propose a fair, 90-10 split. I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial outcome if you accept.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. This is my opening offer.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. This offer is fair and ensures we both get a decent share. Let's end this game.
I'm not willing to accept a 60-40 split. I think 55-45 is a more reasonable compromise.
